channel.title: GoHealMe - The People's Health Community
channel.description: Latest health guides, wellness tips, and community updates from GoHealMe - the revolutionary health platform built by the people, for the people.

item.title: Comprehensive Guide to Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) Recovery
item.description: Understanding TBI symptoms, treatment options, and recovery strategies often overlooked by mainstream medicine.

item.title: EMF Sensitivity: Symptoms, Protection, and Management
item.description: Complete guide to electromagnetic field sensitivity, a condition often dismissed by conventional healthcare.

item.title: Sleep Disorders: Comprehensive Treatment Guide
item.description: Understanding insomnia, sleep apnea, and restless leg syndrome with natural and medical treatment options.

item.title: Mental Health Support: Depression, Anxiety, ADHD, and More
item.description: Comprehensive mental health resources including alternative approaches and community support systems.
